game.l_dis:
Play Earthworm Jim 2 Online – Classic GBA Platformer

Earthworm Jim 2 brings the wacky and irreverent platforming adventure of the original to the Game Boy Advance. Players take control of Jim, the super-powered earthworm, as he embarks on a mission to rescue Princess What's-Her-Name, navigating bizarre levels full of unpredictable challenges and enemies.

What is Earthworm Jim 2?

Earthworm Jim 2 is a 1995 run-and-gun platformer developed by Shiny Entertainment. It is known for its highly varied and unorthodox gameplay, combining traditional platforming with level-specific challenges, including rescuing puppies, defeating Psy-Crow, and using Jim’s snot whip and new weapons to overcome obstacles. The game maintains the series’ signature humor and eclectic character design.

How to Play Earthworm Jim 2

  • Run and Jump: Navigate tricky platforms and avoid environmental hazards.
  • Use Jim’s Weapons: Wield blasters, the snot whip, and other tools to defeat enemies.
  • Complete Level-Specific Goals: Each stage has unique objectives and challenges.
  • Rescue Characters: Save puppies and assist other characters along the way.
  • Defeat Bosses: Outsmart Psy-Crow and other eccentric villains in inventive battles.

Why Play Earthworm Jim 2 Online?

Play Earthworm Jim 2 unblocked in your browser to experience one of the most creative and humorous platformers of the 90s. Enjoy a mix of action, puzzles, and comedy without downloads or emulators.

Key Features

  • Quirky Platforming: Highly varied levels with unique objectives.
  • Humorous Story and Characters: The signature irreverent tone of the series.
  • New Weapons: Jim's arsenal includes blasters, snot whip, and more.
  • Boss Battles: Face off against iconic foes like Psy-Crow.
  • Unblocked Play: Play directly online in your browser with no setup required.

Join Jim on His Absurd Adventure!

Guide Earthworm Jim through a chaotic and humorous world filled with wacky enemies, bizarre levels, and unpredictable challenges. Rescue Princess What's-Her-Name and enjoy the timeless action-platforming fun—play online today!
